name: Castle Polidori
description:
The beast Polidori has returned to its castle . Venture toward your ultimate goal all while avoiding Polidori's assortment of minions. Avoid the blood that drips from the walls and is pooled on the floor. Polidori requires a worthy vessel.

Castle Polidori was created over the course of 3 days for the 72-hour Mini Jam 118:Vampires featuring the limitation "Blood is lethal". The game was designed in the spirit of the classic top-down Atari 2600 games of the early 1980s, such as Adventure and Secret Quest. 

Controls: Arrows key and mouse (for main menu start)

Programming, pixel art, and sound design: substance5271

Additional pixel art and monster design: Darby
